attributes.action: Stop abusers taking women and children through family court.
attributes.additional_details:
To be able to drag the victim through family court is an absolute disgrace. It causes more damage to the women and children. If these men really did care they wouldn’t have abused their family in the first place. No women should have to go through this and there is no way they should have to be subjected to more abuse, Control and coercion.
Victims of abuse need to be protected fully. There should be no contact  what so ever to ensure the safety of the children and women.
attributes.background: When a woman has had to flee her home due to domestic violence and Abuse, there needs to be protection in place to stop the abuser taking the women through family court. This is another way to abuse/control the fleeing partner and children. It is just another form of abuse.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the courts to take, based on individual circumstances.
